articles.title: Indonesia set to pass new criminal code that will ban sex outside marriage - Reuters.com
articles.description: Indonesia is expected to ratify sweeping changes to its criminal code on Tuesday, senior officials confirmed, in a legal overhaul that critics say could curb freedoms and police morality in the Southeast Asian nation.
articles.content: JAKARTA, Dec 5 (Reuters) - Indonesia is expected to ratify sweeping changes to its criminal code on Tuesday, senior officials confirmed, in a legal overhaul that critics say could curb freedoms and p… [+2691 chars]

articles.title: Women are more burnt out than men – here's why, and what to do if you're chronically overwhelmed - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In an episode of the Womankind podcast, CNA Women's Hidayah Salamat asks a former corporate lawyer and co-founder of an online mental health platform why women appear disproportionately more affected by burnout – and the simplest way to stop it in its tracks.
